[TITLE]
<line: 27> DEFENDANTS’ JOINT MOTION FOR ENLARGEMENT OF TIME

[TEXT]
<line: 29> NOW COME the defendants, VILLAGE OF ORLAND PARK and PETER DIANGI, by 
<line: 30> and through their attorneys, LITCHFIELD CAVO LLP and SILVER LAKE COUNTRY CLUB, 
<line: 31> INC. and PETER DIANGI, through their attorneys, WILSON, ELSER, MOSKOWITZ, 
<line: 32> EDELMAN & DICKER and request an enlargement of time in which to answer plaintiff’s 
<line: 33> Amended Complaint at Law.  

[TEXT]
<line: 35> 1. 
<line: 36> Counsel for the parties are coordinating their answers for consistency among 
<line: 37> multiple defendants.  

[TEXT]
<line: 39> 2. 
<line: 40> Counsel for defendants request an additional ten (10) days in which to answer or 
<line: 41> otherwise plead to plaintiff’s Amended Complaint at Law, up to and including July 18, 2008.  

[TEXT]
<line: 43> 3. 
<line: 44> No party will be prejudiced by this extension.  

[TITLE]
<line: 46> LITCHFIELD CAVO LLP 

[TEXT]
<line: 48> WILSON, ELSER, MOSKOWITZ, EDELMAN   
<line: 49> & DICKER

[TEXT]
<line: 6> I, the undersigned, being first duly sworn upon oath, depose, and say that I caused to be 
<line: 7> served Defendants’ Motion for Enlargement of Time  by electronically filing the same with the 
<line: 8> Clerk for the U.S. District Court for the Northern District of Illinois, Eastern Division, a copy of 
<line: 9> which was then forwarded to each attorney of record on the 9th day of July,  2008.
